channel.title: How can I get NPCs to walk around insted of standing in one spot
channel.description: How do I get NPC's to walk around insted of them just standing there like wet lemons

item.title: How can I get NPCs to walk around insted of standing in one spot
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_tom 0wn3r tom
item.description:
@0wn3r_tom wrote:

go to autospawn.cfg and u see this

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

down that u see something like this

spawn = 1558	2860	3707	0	0	0	0	0	2	meep

the “1558” means the id of the monster
the “2860” means the XCoord
the “3707” means the YCoord
the first “0” means the height
the four “0’s” u see arn’t interesting atm…

now, the last “2” u see means the walktype, you can change it, just try something out

Read full topic
item.source: How can I get NPCs to walk around insted of standing in one spot
